code: export const truncateStart=(source,maxLength)=>{if(source.length<maxLength||maxLength<=0)return source;const truncatedSource=source.substring(source.length-maxLength,source.length).trim();if(truncatedSource.length)return`…${truncatedSource}`;return truncatedSource;};export const truncateEnd=(source,maxLength)=>{if(source.length<maxLength||maxLength<=0)return source;const truncatedSource=source.substring(0,maxLength).trim();if(truncatedSource.length){if([".","?","!"].includes(truncatedSource[truncatedSource.length-1])){return`${truncatedSource} …`;}return`${truncatedSource}…`;}return truncatedSource;};
